developer_warning: Warning This is a developer page and has not been through user research

header.feedback: You’re viewing a new version of StatsWales. Get support at {{support_email}}.

error.generic: You could not be logged in. Try again later.
error.expired: Your session has expired. You need to sign in again.

form.notice_1: The username we've given you is temporary. You'll only be able to log in with it whilst we run this round of testing.
form.notice_2: Do not upload any sensitive data or data that other StatsWales users should not have access to.

key_information.heading: Main information
key_information.no_source: No specific source from data provider
key_information.next_update_missing: Publish date or update frequency not entered yet
key_information.not_updated: This dataset will not be updated

dataset_view.table_note: This is not shown in the consumer view

cube_preview.panel: This is a preview of this dataset.
cube_preview.heading: Main information

delete_dataset.heading: By continuing, you confirm this dataset should be deleted
delete_dataset.message: All data for this dataset will be removed permanently. This cannot be undone.

start.title: Create a new dataset
start.p1: To create a new dataset, you'll need:
start.data_table: a data table containing data values and references to all relevant dimensions
start.lookup_table: any user-generated lookup tables you need to include (if relevant)
start.metadata: metadata about this dataset, in the language in which you're viewing this service

errors.no_groups: You must be an editor in at least one group to create a dataset

dimension_name.dimension_heading: What should this dimension be called on the StatsWales website?
dimension_name.measure_heading: What should this measure be called on the StatsWales website?
dimension_name.concise: concise and clearly explain what the dimension contains
dimension_name.unique: different to other dimension names in this dataset
dimension_name.language: entered in the language in which you're viewing this service

dimension_type_chooser.heading: Add reference data
dimension_type_chooser.question: What kind of data does this dimension contain?

time_dimension_chooser.heading: Set up dimension containing dates
time_dimension_chooser.question: What kind of dates does the dimension contain?

chooser.period-hint: For example, months or years for which data values apply to
chooser.point-hint: For example, specific dates when data values were collected

number_chooser.heading: Set up dimension containing numbers
number_chooser.question: What kind of numbers does this dimension contain?

chooser.decimal_places: How many decimal places should be displayed?

number_chooser.confirm: By continuing, you confirm the dimension is correct.

lookup_table_review.heading: Check the lookup table
lookup_table_review.explain: The uploaded lookup table has been added to a standardised lookup table. There may be columns in this standardised lookup table that were not in the uploaded lookup table.
lookup_table_review.showing: Showing a sample of {{rows}} of {{total}} rows.
lookup_table_review.confirm: By continuing, you confirm the lookup table is correct.
lookup_table_review.dimension_confirm: By continuing, you confirm the dimension is displaying correctly.
lookup_table_review.change_dimension_type: Change what kind of data this dimension contains

measure_review.heading: Check the measure table
measure_review.explain: The uploaded measure lookup table has been added to a standardised measure table. There may be columns in this measure table that were not in the uploaded measure lookup table.
measure_review.showing: Showing a sample of {{rows}} of {{total}} rows.
measure_review.confirm: By continuing, you confirm the measure table is correct.

time_dimension_review.heading: Confirm the dates are correct
time_dimension_review.showing: Showing a sample of {{rows}} of {{total}} rows.
time_dimension_review.confirm: By continuing, you confirm the dates are correct.

period-type-chooser.heading: What are the shortest periods in the dimension?

year_type.heading: What type of year does the dimension represent?

year_format.heading: What format is used for years in the dimension?

quarter_format.heading: What format is used for quarters in the dimension?
quarter_format.heading-alt: What format is used for quarterly totals?
quarter_format.fifth_quarter: Is a fifth quarter used to represent yearly totals?
quarter_format.fifth_example: For example, 2024Q5 to represent the total for 2024

month_format.heading: What format is used for months in the dimension?

measure_match_failure.heading: Measure lookup table cannot be matched to the data table
measure_match_failure.measure_subheading: Reference codes in the measure lookup table that cannot be matched
measure_match_failure.information: {{failureCount, number}} instances of reference codes in the data table cannot be found in the measure lookup table.
measure_match_failure.things_to_check: You should check you selected the correct data table and measure lookup table and that they both:
measure_match_failure.choices: do not contain any trailing spaces after any values
measure_match_failure.upload_different_measure: Upload corrected or different measure lookup table

dimension_match_failure.lookup_heading: Lookup table data cannot be matched to the data table
dimension_match_failure.heading: Reference data cannot be matched to the data table
dimension_match_failure.lookup_information: {{failureCount, number}} instances of reference codes in the data table could not be found in the uploaded lookup table.
dimension_match_failure.you_should_check: You should check you selected the correct data table and lookup table and that they both:
dimension_match_failure.ref_information: {{failureCount, number}} instances of reference codes in the data table could not be found in the selected standardised reference data.
dimension_match_failure.you_should_check_ref: You should check you selected the correct data table and reference data. You should also check the data table:
dimension_match_failure.choices: do not contain any trailing spaces after any values
dimension_match_failure.ref_choices: does not contain any trailing spaces after any values
dimension_match_failure.fact_table_subheading: Reference codes in the data table that cannot be matched
dimension_match_failure.upload_different_file: Upload corrected or different data table
dimension_match_failure.upload_different_file_warning: Warning: This will remove all reference data from all dimensions
dimension_match_failure.try_different_lookup: Upload corrected or different lookup table
dimension_match_failure.no_matches: None of the dates matched the format supplied
dimension_match_failure.missing_data_table_values: Reference codes in the data table that cannot be matched
dimension_match_failure.missing_lookup_table_values: Reference codes in the lookup table that cannot be matched

period_match_failure.heading: Date formatting cannot be matched to the dimension
period_match_failure.information: {{failureCount, number}} instances of date codes in the dimension do not match the date formatting you have indicated. You should check:
period_match_failure.formatting: all date codes in the dimension are correct and do not contain any trailing spaces
period_match_failure.choices: you indicated the correct date formatting
period_match_failure.subheading: Date codes in the data table that cannot be matched
period_match_failure.fact_table_subheading: Reference codes in the data table that cannot be matched
period_match_failure.upload_different_file: Upload corrected or different data table
period_match_failure.upload_different_file_warning: Warning: This will remove all reference data from all dimensions
period_match_failure.no_matches: None of the dates matched the format supplied

group.heading: Which group should this dataset belong to?

error.invalid: Select which group this dataset should belong to
error.missing: Select which group this dataset should belong to

title.heading: What is the title of this dataset?
title.appear: This is the title that will appear on the StatsWales website
title.descriptive: It should be short, descriptive and unique

title.hint: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter the title of this dataset
error.too_long: The title of this dataset must be 1,000 characters or less
error.too_short: The title of this dataset must be 3 characters or more
error.unique: The entered title is already in use for a currently published dataset. Enter a unique title for this dataset.

error.missing: No group has been selected for this dataset. You need to create this dataset again from the dataset list.

summary.heading: What is the summary of this dataset?
summary.explain_1: what this dataset is about and what it shows
summary.explain_2: this dataset's dimensions and why they've been used, if needed
summary.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter the summary of this dataset

collection.heading: How was the data collected or calculated?
collection.explain: In short, simple sentences explain either:
collection.explain_1: the methodology used to collect the data
collection.explain_2: the methodology used to calculate the data
collection.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter how the data was collected or calculated

quality.heading: What is the statistical quality of this dataset?
quality.explain_1: any issues or methodological changes related to this dataset including any:
quality.explain_1a: notes relevant to all data values in this dataset
quality.explain_1b: custom explanations needed to clarify any note codes used
quality.explain_2: a high-level summary of the statistical quality report, if available
quality.language: This should be entered in the language in which you're viewing this service.

error.missing: Enter the statistical quality of this dataset

rounding_applied.heading: Has rounding been applied to the data values?

yes.label: Yes
yes.note: In short, simple sentences explain what rounding has been applied.

error.missing: Select whether any rounding has been applied to the data values

rounding_description.label: In short, simple sentences explain what rounding has been applied

error.missing: Enter what rounding has been applied to the data values

update_frequency.heading: Will this dataset be regularly updated?

error.missing: Select if this dataset will be regularly updated or not

frequency_value.label: Enter the period between updates. For example, 1 year.

Select whether the period between updates is in weeks, months or years

error.invalid: The date this dataset should be published must be a real date

day.label: Day
day.error: The date this dataset should be published must include a day

month.label: Month
month.error: The date this dataset should be published must include a month

year.label: Year
year.error: The date this dataset should be published must include a year

time.label: Time
time.hint: This will be 09:30 by default. Only change this if a different publication time is needed. Use 24 hour clock format, for example 15:00.

error.invalid: The time this dataset should be published must be a real time

hour.label: Hour
hour.error: The time this dataset should be published must include an hour

minute.label: Minute
minute.error: The time this dataset should be published must include a minute

error.missing: Select the populated translation file to upload

error.values: The translation file must be fully populated for both languages

error.no_datasets: No datasets are currently listed in the database. If you need help, contact a member of the development team.

error.no_dimensions: This dataset has not been completed with dimensions
error.no_revisions: This dataset has not been completed with revisions

dataset.delete_failed: Failed to delete dataset due a server error

confirm.missing: You need to confirm or reject the uploaded file using the buttons at the end of the preview

session.current_dataset_missing: A data table cannot be found. Try uploading a data table.
session.current_revision_missing: A data table cannot be found. Try uploading a data table.
session.current_import_missing: A data table cannot be found. Try uploading a data table.
session.no_sources_on_import: The selected data table does not contain any dimensions. Check the data table is correct.

sources.unknowns_found: Select what each column in the data table contains
sources.multiple_datavalues: There should only be one column in the data table for data values. Check you've selected the correct options or check the data table is correct.
sources.multiple_footnotes: There should only be one column in the data table for note codes. Check you've selected the correct options or check the data table is correct.
sources.multiple_measures: There should only be one column in the data table for measure or data types. Check you've selected the correct options or check the data table is correct.
sources.dimension_creation_failed: Dimensions could not be created. Check you've selected the correct options or check the data table is correct.

preview.failed_to_get_preview: Table preview could not be generated. Check you've added reference data to all dimensions or the data table is correct.
preview.remove_error: Uploaded file could not be removed from the server. Try again or contact support.
preview.confirm_error: Confirm or reject the uploaded file
preview.revision_missing: A revision is missing from this dataset
preview.import_missing: An import is missing from this dataset
preview.invalid_download_format: Select whether to download dataset as CSV, Parquet, Excel or DuckDB
preview.select_action: Select whether you need to upload a different data table or change the definition of what each column in the data table contains

preview_failure.heading: Filed to generate dataset preview for {{datasetTitle}}
preview_failure.message: Something went wrong trying to generate preview
preview_failure.error: We were unable to generate a preview of the dataset due to an unexpected server error.
preview_failure.no_preview: Cube could not be generated, so table preview and download options are not available. Check you've added reference data to all dimensions or the data table is correct.

errors.datalake_error: Unable to connect to Data Lake
errors.blob_storage_errror: Unable to connect to Blob Storage Service
errors.dataset_missing: No dataset found with this ID

dimension_validation.duplicate_descriptions_or_notes: The descriptions columns in the lookup table are the same in all languages. Descriptions must be provided in all required languages.
dimension_validation.fact_table_creation_failed: Fact table could not be created by the system. Try again later or contact support.
dimension_validation.items_not_in_category: There are reference values in the dimension that are not in the data category you selected. Check you selected the correct type of data.
dimension_validation.lookup_not_supported: The file you uploaded could not be recognised. Check the file is in the correct format.
dimension_validation.lookup_table_loading_failed: Lookup table could not be added by the system. Try again later or contact support.
dimension_validation.missing_languages: The lookup table does not contain descriptions in the following languages: $t({{languages}}).
dimension_validation.no_reference_data_categories_present: There are reference values in the dimension that are not in the data category you selected. Check you selected the correct type of data.
dimension_validation.no_reference_match: There are reference values in the dimension that are not in the data category you selected. Check you selected the correct type of data.
dimension_validation.non_numerical_values_present: The dimension contains non-numerical values. Check you selected the correct type of reference data and that your data table is correct.
dimension_validation.primary_key_failed: There are duplicate references in your lookup table. Remove any duplicates from your lookup table and upload it again.
dimension_validation.reference_data_preview_failed: Reference data could not be added by the system. Try again later or contact support.
Reference data could not be added to cube. Check you selected the correct type of reference data and that your data table is correct.
dimension_validation.some_references_failed_to_match: Reference data cannot be matched to the data table. Check you selected the correct type of reference data and that your data table is correct.
dimension_validation.to_many_categories_present: There are reference values in the dimension that are not in the data category you selected. Check you selected the correct type of data.
dimension_validation.unknown_error: Something went wrong adding the reference data to the cube. Try again later or contact support.
dimension_validation.unknown_reference_data_items: Reference data cannot be matched to the data table. Check you selected the correct type of reference data and that your data table is correct.
dimension_validation.unknown_type: The type of dimension data you selected is not supported. You should selected 'Something else' and upload a lookup table.

measure_validation.duplicate_descriptions_or_notes: The descriptions columns in the measure lookup table are the same in all languages. Descriptions must be provided in all required languages.
measure_validation.extracting_data_failed: Measure lookup table could not be added to the cube. Check that you uploaded the correct lookup table.
measure_validation.invalid_decimals_present: The decimal column in the measure lookup table should only contain positive integer values. Correct the measure lookup table and upload it again.
measure_validation.invalid_formats_present: The decimal column in the measure lookup table should only contain either decimal, float, integer, long, percentage, string, text, date, datetime or time. Correct the measure lookup table and upload it again.
measure_validation.missing_languages: The measure lookup table does not contain descriptions in the following languages: $t({{languages}}).
measure_validation.no_description_columns: The measure lookup table does not contain any description columns. Correct the measure lookup table and upload it again.
measure_validation.no_join_column: Measure lookup table could not be added to the cube. Check that the measure lookup table contains a refcode column. Correct the measure lookup table and upload it again.
measure_validation.no_reference_match: Measure lookup table cannot be matched to the data table. Check you uploaded the correct measure lookup table and that your data table is correct.
measure_validation.primary_key_failed: There are duplicate references in your measure lookup table. Remove any duplicates from your measure lookup table and upload it again.
measure_validation.some_references_failed_to_match: Lookup table cannot be matched to the data table. Check you uploaded the correct lookup table and that your data table is correct.
measure_validation.unknown_error: Measure lookup table could not be added to the cube by the system. Try again later or contact support.

file_validation.invalid_decimals_present: The decimal column in the measure lookup table should only contain positive integer values. Correct the measure lookup table and upload it again.
file_validation.wrong_data_type_in_reference: Lookup table cannot be matched to the data table. Check you uploaded the correct lookup table and that your data table is correct.
file_validation.unknown_mime_type: The selected file must be in CSV, Excel (XLSX), JSON or Parquet format
file_validation.unknown_file_format: The selected file must be in CSV, Excel (XLSX), JSON or Parquet format
file_validation.invalid_unicode: CSV and JSON files must be in UTF-8 format. Save the file in the correct format and upload it again.
file_validation.missing_languages: The lookup table does not contain descriptions in the all required languages
file_validation.invalid_csv: Could not upload the selected CSV file. Check the file is correct and try again.
file_validation.invalid_json: Could not upload the selected JSON file. Check the file is correct and try again.
file_validation.fact_table: Fact table could not be created by the system. Try again later or contact support.
file_validation.datalake: A required file could not be found in the service's data storage. Try again later or contact support.
file_validation.unknown: Something went wrong with the system. Try again later or contact support.
